name: RTCInboundRtpStreamStats.sliCount
description: The sliCount property of the RTCInboundRtpStreamStats dictionary indicates how many Slice Loss Indication (SLI) packets the RTCRtpReceiver for which this object provdes statistics sent to the remote RTCRtpSender.

refs.name: Identifiers for WebRTC's Statistics API
refs.description: The definition of 'RTCInboundRtpStreamStats.sliCount' in the 'Identifiers for WebRTC's Statistics API' specification.
